name: Key Challenges: Storing Secrets for Consumer Cryptography
description:
If programmable cryptography is a way to turn real world problems of trust 
and coordination into problems of key management, how can we tackle the 
 problem of storing cryptographic secrets in a secure and accessible way
 for broad audiences? We’ll talk about our thoughts on key management for Daimo, a stablecoin 
payments app on Ethereum we’re building, and how Device Keys and 
Passkeys can enable secure and friendly self-custody wallets with 
Account Abstraction and P256 signature verification on-chain.

speakers.name: Nalin
speakers.bio: Nalin is co-founder of Daimo, a stablecoin payments app enabling secure self-custody wallets on Ethereum.
